attributes.action: We the people demand a general election before June 2019
attributes.additional_details: We now demand that a general election be held before June 2019 so that we can have a chance to effectively fire the MP's that have worked and plotted against us and replace them with MP's that will honour and respect the British people
attributes.background:
In June 2016 the British public instructed the MP's of this country to do a job.
By June of this year they will have had three years to complete the task yet they have failed in every way.
They have not done what we (their employers) told them to do.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

You need to give your full name to start a petition.
